name: Curtained Moon
description:
A Yume Nikki fangame inspired by noir aesthetics. Made for Dream Diary Jam 2.

Travel through dreams of Veda, uncover secrets of her past and find the moon. By touching any object, you can travel to another dream. You can always wake up by pressing C.

V. 0.00.1 contains:

- 3 endings;

- 6 original music tracks;

- 7 locations;

- 2 additional stories;

- your Moon.
